overview: Employee Benefits: Alexis Fawx and Oliver Davis find themselves alone in the office at the end of a long day. They soon start commiserating about their boss; how difficult he can be, how they have to cover for him with clients, how consistently he's absent from his own home office. Gesturing towards the large empty desk in the corner of the room they try to remember the last time they saw it occupied. Well, if he's not going to use the desk for its intended purpose maybe they should put it to use themselves.
title: Sexual Fantasies 8
